item.title: Matrix Product States (MPS)
item.description: Matrix Product States # Origins: DMRG # The Density Matrix Renormalization Group algorithm is a numerical method developed by Stephen White Infinite DMRG # Step 1: Superblock Hamiltonian # \[H = - J \sum_{j=1}^N \sigma_j \sigma_{j+1} - h \sum_{j=1}^N \sigma_j\] Step 2: Select target state # \[H_{BB} = Q \Lambda Q^\dagger\] Usually, the desired state is the ground state which corresponds to eigenstate with the lowest eigenvalue.
